mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff(staff_mac, ap_id, name, sex, tel, birth, title) VALUES (#{staff.staff_mac},#{staff.ap_id},#{staff.name},#{staff.sex}, #{staff.tel},#{staff.birth},#{staff.title})
